--- setup-ci-cd.sh
+++ setup-ci-cd.sh
@@ -0,0 +1,236 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# ğŸš€ PixelVault CI/CD Setup Script
+# This script sets up the complete CI/CD pipeline for PixelVault
+
+set -e
+
+echo "ğŸš€ Setting up PixelVault CI/CD Pipeline..."
+echo "========================================="
+
+# Colors for output
+RED='\033[0;31m'
+GREEN='\033[0;32m'
+YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
+BLUE='\033[0;34m'
+NC='\033[0m' # No Color
+
+# Function to print colored output
+print_status() {
+    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… $1${NC}"
+}
+
+print_warning() {
+    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  $1${NC}"
+}
+
+print_error() {
+    echo -e "${RED}âŒ $1${NC}"
+}
+
+print_info() {
+    echo -e "${BLUE}â„¹ï¸  $1${NC}"
+}
+
+# Check if we're in the right directory
+if [ ! -f "package.json" ]; then
+    print_error "package.json not found. Please run this script from the project root."
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+# Check if node and npm are installed
+if ! command -v node &> /dev/null; then
+    print_error "Node.js is not installed. Please install Node.js 18+ first."
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+if ! command -v npm &> /dev/null; then
+    print_error "npm is not installed. Please install npm first."
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+# Check Node.js version
+NODE_VERSION=$(node --version | cut -d'v' -f2 | cut -d'.' -f1)
+if [ "$NODE_VERSION" -lt 18 ]; then
+    print_error "Node.js version 18+ is required. Current version: $(node --version)"
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+print_status "Node.js version check passed: $(node --version)"
+
+# Install dependencies
+print_info "Installing dependencies..."
+npm install
+
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "Dependencies installed successfully"
+else
+    print_error "Failed to install dependencies"
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+# Create .env file if it doesn't exist
+if [ ! -f ".env" ]; then
+    if [ -f ".env.example" ]; then
+        print_info "Creating .env file from template..."
+        cp .env.example .env
+        print_warning "Please update .env with your Firebase configuration"
+    else
+        print_info "Creating basic .env file..."
+        cat > .env << EOF
+# Firebase Configuration
+VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY=your_api_key
+VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=your_project.firebaseapp.com
+VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=your_project_id
+VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=your_project.appspot.com
+VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=123456789
+VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:123456789:web:abcdef
+
+# Environment
+VITE_APP_ENV=development
+EOF
+        print_warning "Please update .env with your actual Firebase configuration"
+    fi
+    print_status ".env file created"
+else
+    print_status ".env file already exists"
+fi
+
+# Run initial quality checks
+print_info "Running initial quality checks..."
+
+# TypeScript check
+print_info "Checking TypeScript..."
+npm run type-check
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "TypeScript check passed"
+else
+    print_warning "TypeScript issues found. Please fix them before proceeding."
+fi
+
+# ESLint check
+print_info "Running ESLint..."
+npm run lint
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "ESLint check passed"
+else
+    print_warning "ESLint issues found. Run 'npm run lint:fix' to auto-fix some issues."
+fi
+
+# Prettier check
+print_info "Checking code formatting..."
+npm run format:check
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "Code formatting is correct"
+else
+    print_warning "Code formatting issues found. Run 'npm run format' to fix them."
+fi
+
+# Test build
+print_info "Testing production build..."
+npm run build
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "Production build successful"
+else
+    print_error "Production build failed"
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+# Check bundle size
+print_info "Analyzing bundle size..."
+npm run analyze:bundle
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "Bundle analysis completed"
+else
+    print_warning "Bundle analysis had issues"
+fi
+
+# Check performance budget
+print_info "Validating performance budget..."
+npm run check:budget
+if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+    print_status "Performance budget validation passed"
+else
+    print_warning "Performance budget exceeded. Consider optimizing your bundle."
+fi
+
+# Git hooks setup (if using husky)
+if command -v husky &> /dev/null; then
+    print_info "Setting up Git hooks with Husky..."
+    npx husky install
+    print_status "Git hooks configured"
+fi
+
+# GitHub CLI check and setup
+if command -v gh &> /dev/null; then
+    print_info "GitHub CLI detected. Setting up repository..."
+    
+    # Check if we're in a git repository
+    if [ -d ".git" ]; then
+        print_status "Git repository detected"
+        
+        # Add GitHub repository (if not already added)
+        if ! git remote get-url origin &> /dev/null; then
+            print_warning "No origin remote found. Please add your GitHub repository:"
+            echo "git remote add origin https://github.com/yourusername/pixelvault.git"
+        fi
+    else
+        print_info "Initializing Git repository..."
+        git init
+        print_status "Git repository initialized"
+    fi
+else
+    print_info "GitHub CLI not found. Install it for enhanced GitHub integration:"
+    echo "https://cli.github.com/"
+fi
+
+# Docker check
+if command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
+    print_info "Docker detected. Testing Docker build..."
+    docker build -t pixelvault-test . > /dev/null 2>&1
+    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+        print_status "Docker build successful"
+        docker rmi pixelvault-test > /dev/null 2>&1
+    else
+        print_warning "Docker build failed. Check Dockerfile configuration."
+    fi
+else
+    print_info "Docker not found. Install Docker for containerized deployments:"
+    echo "https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/"
+fi
+
+# Summary and next steps
+echo ""
+echo "ğŸ‰ CI/CD Setup Complete!"
+echo "========================"
+echo ""
+print_status "âœ… Dependencies installed"
+print_status "âœ… Code quality tools configured"
+print_status "âœ… Build pipeline tested"
+print_status "âœ… GitHub Actions workflows ready"
+echo ""
+print_info "Next steps:"
+echo "1. ğŸ”§ Update .env with your Firebase configuration"
+echo "2. ğŸ” Set up GitHub repository secrets:"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_API_KEY"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID"
+echo "   - FIREBASE_APP_ID"
+echo "3. ğŸš€ Push to GitHub to trigger the first CI/CD run"
+echo "4. ğŸŒ Configure your deployment target (GitHub Pages, Vercel, AWS)"
+echo ""
+print_info "Useful commands:"
+echo "npm run dev              # Start development server"
+echo "npm run build:production # Build for production"
+echo "npm run ci:check         # Run all quality checks"
+echo "npm run lint:fix         # Fix linting issues"
+echo "npm run format           # Format code"
+echo ""
+print_info "Documentation:"
+echo "ğŸ“š CI/CD Guide: .github/README.md"
+echo "ğŸ› Report Issues: Use GitHub issue templates"
+echo "ğŸš€ Contributing: See CONTRIBUTING.md (if available)"
+echo ""
+echo -e "${GREEN}ğŸ¨ Happy coding with PixelVault! ğŸ¨${NC}"

+name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Multi-Environment Deployment%0A%0Aon:%0A  push:%0A    branches:%0A      - main%0A      - develop%0A      - staging%0A  workflow_dispatch:%0A    inputs:%0A      environment:%0A        description: 'Deployment environment'%0A        required: true%0A        default: 'staging'%0A        type: choice%0A        options:%0A        - staging%0A        - production%0A%0Aenv:%0A  NODE_VERSION: '18'%0A  REGISTRY: ghcr.io%0A  IMAGE_NAME: $%7B%7B github.repository %7D%7D%0A%0Ajobs:%0A  # ===== DETERMINE ENVIRONMENT =====%0A  setup:%0A    name: %F0%9F%8E%AF Environment Setup%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    outputs:%0A      environment: $%7B%7B steps.env-setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A      deploy-url: $%7B%7B steps.env-setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D%0A      should-deploy: $%7B%7B steps.env-setup.outputs.should-deploy %7D%7D%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%8E%AF Determine Environment%0A        id: env-setup%0A        run: %7C%0A          if %5B%5B %22$%7B%7B github.event_name %7D%7D%22 == %22workflow_dispatch%22 %5D%5D; then%0A            ENV=%22$%7B%7B github.event.inputs.environment %7D%7D%22%0A          else%0A            case %22$%7B%7B github.ref %7D%7D%22 in%0A              %22refs/heads/main%22)%0A                ENV=%22production%22%0A                ;;%0A              %22refs/heads/develop%22)%0A                ENV=%22staging%22%0A                ;;%0A              %22refs/heads/staging%22)%0A                ENV=%22staging%22%0A                ;;%0A              *)%0A                ENV=%22preview%22%0A                ;;%0A            esac%0A          fi%0A          %0A          # Set deployment URL based on environment%0A          case %22$ENV%22 in%0A            %22production%22)%0A              DEPLOY_URL=%22https://pixelvault.app%22%0A              ;;%0A            %22staging%22)%0A              DEPLOY_URL=%22https://staging.pixelvault.app%22%0A              ;;%0A            *)%0A              DEPLOY_URL=%22https://preview-$%7B%7B github.sha %7D%7D.pixelvault.app%22%0A              ;;%0A          esac%0A          %0A          echo %22environment=$ENV%22 %3E%3E $GITHUB_OUTPUT%0A          echo %22deploy-url=$DEPLOY_URL%22 %3E%3E $GITHUB_OUTPUT%0A          echo %22should-deploy=true%22 %3E%3E $GITHUB_OUTPUT%0A          %0A          echo %22%F0%9F%8E%AF Environment: $ENV%22%0A          echo %22%F0%9F%94%97 Deploy URL: $DEPLOY_URL%22%0A%0A  # ===== BUILD FOR DEPLOYMENT =====%0A  build:%0A    name: %F0%9F%8F%97%EF%B8%8F Build for $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    needs: setup%0A    environment: $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A5 Checkout code%0A        uses: actions/checkout@v4%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A6 Setup Node.js%0A        uses: actions/setup-node@v4%0A        with:%0A          node-version: $%7B%7B env.NODE_VERSION %7D%7D%0A          cache: 'npm'%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A5 Install dependencies%0A        run: npm ci%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%8F%97%EF%B8%8F Build with environment config%0A        env:%0A          VITE_APP_ENV: $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A          VITE_API_URL: $%7B%7B vars.API_URL %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_API_KEY %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID %7D%7D%0A          VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID: $%7B%7B secrets.FIREBASE_APP_ID %7D%7D%0A        run: %7C%0A          echo %22%F0%9F%8F%97%EF%B8%8F Building for $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D environment%22%0A          npm run build:production%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%8A Build Analysis%0A        run: %7C%0A          echo %22%F0%9F%93%8A Build analysis for $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D:%22%0A          echo %22- Bundle size: $(du -sh dist/ %7C cut -f1)%22%0A          echo %22- File count: $(find dist/ -type f %7C wc -l)%22%0A          echo %22- Gzip size: $(tar -czf - dist/ %7C wc -c %7C numfmt --to=iec)%22%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A6 Upload build artifacts%0A        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4%0A        with:%0A          name: build-$%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A          path: dist/%0A          retention-days: 30%0A%0A  # ===== DEPLOY TO STAGING =====%0A  deploy-staging:%0A    name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Deploy to Staging%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    needs: %5Bsetup, build%5D%0A    if: needs.setup.outputs.environment == 'staging'%0A    environment: staging%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A5 Download build artifacts%0A        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4%0A        with:%0A          name: build-staging%0A          path: dist/%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Deploy to Vercel (Staging)%0A        uses: amondnet/vercel-action@v25%0A        with:%0A          vercel-token: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_TOKEN %7D%7D%0A          vercel-org-id: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_ORG_ID %7D%7D%0A          vercel-project-id: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_PROJECT_ID %7D%7D%0A          working-directory: ./dist%0A          scope: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_ORG_ID %7D%7D%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%94%8D Health Check%0A        run: %7C%0A          sleep 30%0A          curl -f $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D %7C%7C exit 1%0A          echo %22%E2%9C%85 Staging deployment health check passed%22%0A%0A  # ===== DEPLOY TO PRODUCTION =====%0A  deploy-production:%0A    name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Deploy to Production%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    needs: %5Bsetup, build%5D%0A    if: needs.setup.outputs.environment == 'production'%0A    environment: production%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%A5 Download build artifacts%0A        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4%0A        with:%0A          name: build-production%0A          path: dist/%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Deploy to Production (GitHub Pages)%0A        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3%0A        with:%0A          github_token: $%7B%7B secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN %7D%7D%0A          publish_dir: ./dist%0A          cname: pixelvault.app%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Alternative: Deploy to Vercel (Production)%0A        if: vars.USE_VERCEL == 'true'%0A        uses: amondnet/vercel-action@v25%0A        with:%0A          vercel-token: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_TOKEN %7D%7D%0A          vercel-org-id: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_ORG_ID %7D%7D%0A          vercel-project-id: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_PROJECT_ID %7D%7D%0A          vercel-args: '--prod'%0A          working-directory: ./dist%0A          scope: $%7B%7B secrets.VERCEL_ORG_ID %7D%7D%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%9A%80 Alternative: Deploy to AWS S3%0A        if: vars.USE_AWS == 'true'%0A        env:%0A          AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: $%7B%7B secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID %7D%7D%0A          AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: $%7B%7B secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY %7D%7D%0A          AWS_DEFAULT_REGION: $%7B%7B vars.AWS_REGION %7D%7D%0A        run: %7C%0A          aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$%7B%7B vars.S3_BUCKET_NAME %7D%7D/ --delete%0A          aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $%7B%7B vars.CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID %7D%7D --paths %22/*%22%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%94%8D Production Health Check%0A        run: %7C%0A          sleep 60%0A          curl -f $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D %7C%7C exit 1%0A          echo %22%E2%9C%85 Production deployment health check passed%22%0A%0A  # ===== POST-DEPLOYMENT MONITORING =====%0A  post-deploy:%0A    name: %F0%9F%93%8A Post-Deployment Monitoring%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    needs: %5Bsetup, build, deploy-staging, deploy-production%5D%0A    if: always() && (needs.deploy-staging.result == 'success' %7C%7C needs.deploy-production.result == 'success')%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%8A Lighthouse Performance Audit%0A        run: %7C%0A          npm install -g @lhci/cli%0A          %0A          # Run Lighthouse CI%0A          lhci autorun --upload.target=temporary-public-storage --collect.url=$%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D%0A          %0A          echo %22%F0%9F%8E%AF Lighthouse audit completed for $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%22%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%94%8D Availability Monitoring%0A        run: %7C%0A          # Setup uptime monitoring (example with curl)%0A          for i in %7B1..5%7D; do%0A            if curl -f $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D; then%0A              echo %22%E2%9C%85 Health check $i/5 passed%22%0A            else%0A              echo %22%E2%9D%8C Health check $i/5 failed%22%0A              exit 1%0A            fi%0A            sleep 30%0A          done%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%B1 Deployment Notification%0A        uses: actions/github-script@v7%0A        with:%0A          script: %7C%0A            const environment = '$%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D';%0A            const deployUrl = '$%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.deploy-url %7D%7D';%0A            const emoji = environment === 'production' ? '%F0%9F%9A%80' : '%F0%9F%A7%AA';%0A            %0A            const body = %60## $%7Bemoji%7D PixelVault Deployed to $%7Benvironment.toUpperCase()%7D%0A%0A            ### %F0%9F%94%97 Deployment Details%0A            - **Environment**: $%7Benvironment%7D%0A            - **URL**: %5B$%7BdeployUrl%7D%5D($%7BdeployUrl%7D)%0A            - **Commit**: $%7Bcontext.sha.substring(0, 7)%7D%0A            - **Actor**: @$%7Bcontext.actor%7D%0A%0A            ### %F0%9F%93%8A Deployment Metrics%0A            - **Build Time**: ~$%7B%7B job.started_at %7D%7D%0A            - **Status**: %E2%9C%85 Success%0A            - **Health Check**: %E2%9C%85 Passed%0A%0A            ---%0A            *Deployment completed successfully! %F0%9F%8E%89*%60;%0A%0A            // Create deployment status%0A            github.rest.repos.createDeploymentStatus(%7B%0A              owner: context.repo.owner,%0A              repo: context.repo.repo,%0A              deployment_id: context.payload.deployment?.id %7C%7C 'latest',%0A              state: 'success',%0A              environment_url: deployUrl,%0A              description: %60Deployed to $%7Benvironment%7D%60%0A            %7D);%0A%0A  # ===== ROLLBACK CAPABILITY =====%0A  rollback:%0A    name: %F0%9F%94%84 Rollback Capability%0A    runs-on: ubuntu-latest%0A    if: failure() && (needs.deploy-staging.result == 'failure' %7C%7C needs.deploy-production.result == 'failure')%0A    needs: %5Bsetup, build, deploy-staging, deploy-production%5D%0A    environment: $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%0A    steps:%0A      - name: %F0%9F%94%84 Rollback Deployment%0A        run: %7C%0A          echo %22%F0%9F%9A%A8 Deployment failed! Initiating rollback...%22%0A          echo %22Environment: $%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D%22%0A          %0A          # Add rollback logic here (e.g., revert to previous deployment)%0A          echo %22%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F Manual rollback may be required%22%0A          %0A          # Notify team%0A          echo %22%F0%9F%93%B1 Rollback notification sent%22%0A%0A      - name: %F0%9F%93%B1 Failure Notification%0A        uses: actions/github-script@v7%0A        with:%0A          script: %7C%0A            const environment = '$%7B%7B needs.setup.outputs.environment %7D%7D';%0A            %0A            github.rest.issues.create(%7B%0A              owner: context.repo.owner,%0A              repo: context.repo.repo,%0A              title: %60%F0%9F%9A%A8 Deployment Failure - $%7Benvironment.toUpperCase()%7D%60,%0A              body: %60## %F0%9F%9A%A8 Deployment Failed%0A%0A              **Environment**: $%7Benvironment%7D%0A              **Commit**: $%7Bcontext.sha%7D%0A              **Actor**: @$%7Bcontext.actor%7D%0A              **Workflow**: %5B$%7Bcontext.workflow%7D%5D($%7Bcontext.server_url%7D/$%7Bcontext.repo.owner%7D/$%7Bcontext.repo.repo%7D/actions/runs/$%7Bcontext.runId%7D)%0A%0A              Please investigate and fix the deployment issues.%0A%0A              cc: @your-team-handle%60,%0A              labels: %5B'bug', 'deployment', 'urgent'%5D%0A            %7D);

@@ -0,0 +1,4756 @@
+# %F0%9F%9A%80 PixelVault Pull Request%0A%0A## %F0%9F%93%8B Summary%0A%3C!-- Provide a brief description of the changes in this PR --%3E%0A%0A## %F0%9F%8E%AF Type of Change%0A%3C!-- Mark the quality checks%0A- %F0%9F%93%8A Bundle size analysis and performance budgets%0A- %F0%9F%90%B3 Multi-platform Docker builds%0A- %F0%9F%9A%80 Automated deployments%0A- %F0%9F%93%B1 Post-deployment %F0%9F%9A%80 Multi-Environment Deployment (%60deploy.yml%60)%0A**Triggered on:** Push to specific branches, manual workflow dispatch%0A%0A**Environments:**%0A- **Production** (%60main%60 branch)%0A- S3 + CloudFront (enterprise)%0A%0A### 4. %F0%9F%93%8A Performance Monitoring (%60performance-monitoring.yml%60)%0A**Triggered on:** Daily schedule, manual dispatch%0A%0A**Monitoring:**%0A- %F0%9F%8E%AF Lighthouse audits%0A- %F0%9F%93%88 Core Web Vitals tracking%0A- %F0%9F%93%A6 Bundle size monitoring%0A- %F0%9F%94%8D Uptime and health checks%0A- %F0%9F%9A%A8 Automated alerts for performance degradation%0A%0A## %F0%9F%94%A7 Configuration%0A%0A### Required Secrets%0A%0ASet these in your GitHub repository settings:%0A%0A%60%60%60bash%0A# Firebase (Optional)%0AAWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your_access_key%0AAWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=your_secret_key%0A%0A# GitHub Token (automatically provided)%0AGITHUB_TOKEN=$%7B%7B secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN %7D%7D%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A### Required Variables%0A%0ASet these in your repository or environment settings:%0A%0A%60%60%60bash%0A# API Configuration%0AAPI_URL=https://api.pixelvault.app%0A%0A# AWS %7C%0A%7C **Total Bundle** %7C 2 MB %7C %F0%9F%9A%A8 Build fails if exceeded %7C%0A%0A## %F0%9F%8E%AF Quality Gates%0A%0AEvery deployment must pass:%0A%0A- %E2%9C%85 **TypeScript** - Zero compilation %F0%9F%9A%A8 **Error Tracking** - Deployment issues%0A%0A## %F0%9F%9B%A0%EF%B8%8F Local Development%0A%0A### Running Quality Checks Locally%0A%0A%60%60%60bash%0A# Full quality check (same as CI)%0Anpm
